description.value: Category chargeable status for the patient.

copyright.value: Copyright Â© 2016 Health and Social Care Information Centre

definition.value: No status, use to negate any previous status.
Ordinarily resident in the UK (according to the domestic Charging Regulations).
Resident in UK, in possession of a valid visa AND (surcharge paid OR exempt).
Ordinarily resident in another EEA country AND (EHIC/PRC/S2 OR exempt).
Ordinarily resident in another EEA country AND (No EHIC/PRC/S2 OR not exempt).
Not ordinarily resident in the UK, not paid, but exempt by personal status or treatment.
Not ordinarily resident in the UK or EEA, not paid, not exempt by personal status or treatment.
